definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

pinyin: bai2 da4 yi1 gao1 xue4 ya1

sentences.english: He distrusted doctors, and often had Don check his blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 他不信任医生，常叫唐帮他量血压。

sentences.english: The dosages of two drugs were adjusted according to blood pressure change.
sentences.chinese: 根据血压控制情况调整两组的降压药剂量。

sentences.english: Give it a try if youhave a blood pressure monitor at home.
sentences.chinese: 如果你家中有血压计，你可以试一下。

sentences.english: Conclusion These results suggest that benidipine is a safe and effective anti-hypertension drug.
sentences.chinese: 结论贝尼地平是一种安全有效的抗高血压药。

sentences.english: During this time your body temperature is still low, but your blood pressure is sharply rising.
sentences.chinese: 这段时间里你的体温偏低，但血压骤什。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the influence of different doses of astragalus in cats.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察不同剂量的黄芪对猫正常血压的影响。

sentences.english: Those with low blood pressure and hyperchlorhydria are forbidden to drink. When antibiotics are taken, this juice is also forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 低血压及胃酸过多的人士忌用，服用抗生素期间禁用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of enalapril therapy on QT dispersion in hypertensive patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨依那普利对高血压患者QT离散度的影响。

sentences.english: What dietotherapy method falls blood pressure?
sentences.chinese: 有什么食疗方法降血压？

sentences.english: Others have shown garlic prevents platelet aggregation and reduces high blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 其他资料提出大蒜防止血小板凝聚，减少高血压。

sentences.english: Drink much more than that and the caffeine can dehydrate you or raise your blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 而喝得太多，咖啡因会导致你口渴或者升高你的血压。

sentences.english: ConclusionAtorvastation can be used for early renal damage in patients with essential hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨阿托伐他汀对高血压早期肾损害的影响。

sentences.english: Objective Inquire into the function and mechanisms of Sanye Insect tea of lowering the blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨三叶虫茶的降血压作用及作用机制。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate new surgical method to treat hypertensive thalamic hematoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨高血压丘脑出血外科治疗的新方法。

sentences.english: Hyaline arteriolosclerosis with hypertension or diabetes mellitus is usually present.
sentences.chinese: 高血压或糖尿病时常出现动脉玻璃样变。

sentences.english: The dietotherapy for the treatment of hypertension has been paid attention increasingly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，高血压病的饮食疗法日益受到重视。
